name: Kirikari
description: The Kirikari is a Huge, formidable monstrosity with natural armor. It has notable physical features that make it an imposing presence in combat.
memorable: It combines strong physical attacks with environmental control through mist and acid damage.
goals: The Kirikari is likely to ambush and grapple foes while utilizing its corrosive abilities.
relations: It may be encountered with other monstrous creatures or in treacherous natural environments.
environment: Typically found in swampy areas or regions with dense fog.
strengths: High Strength and Dexterity allow effective grappling and maneuverability. Immune to acid and poison damage.
weaknesses: Notably low Intelligence limits tactical options in combat.
attacks: It can perform two slam attacks dealing both bludgeoning and acid damage, alongside a biting attack that inflicts piercing damage and poisons.
most_powerful_ability: The Misty Veil creates obscuring fog that provides battlefield control.
senses: It has tremorsense with a range of 60 feet and a passive perception of 16.
skills: Possesses strong stealth skills with a +11 modifier allowing for effective hiding from enemies.
additional_information: Can unleash a blinding mist that obscures vision.
Grapples targets with its bite attack.
Creates perilous conditions for grappling foes with its corrosive mold ability.
test_queries: Huge creature that grapples and poisons
monster with acid damage and mist abilities
ambush monster that creates dense fog
formidable creature with high stealth skills
